title: :: Hillary Clinton is not eligible under U.S. law, Title 18, section 2071
subtitle: A serial letter claims that Hillary Clinton is not eligible for public office under section 18 of the United States Act, section 2071, but the application of this law to her is questionable.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Hillary Clinton is not eligible to serve as President under the provisions of U.S. law Title 18, section 2071.
